name: SMM - Manager
description:
SMM at Cryptocurrency startup

The main Responsibilities:

  • Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content on various social media platforms daily

  • Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor social media landscape

The main Requirements:

  • Years of experience required: 2+ years of experience (social media or communication manager roles, preferably in crypto projects)

  • Strong knowledge of blockchain , cryptocurrency and defi space

  • A proven experience in working with large socialmedia profiles and pages 100K + (be ready to provide your portfolio)

Terms:

  • Remote work, flexible hours (our team is distributed around the world). Work from anywhere in the world

  • Competitive salary based on a candidate's skills and experience

  • Compensation for work equipment

  • Annual team building event at an international resort
